name: Robocre:8 trials
description:
This is Robocre,a game made in 48 hours.(ludum dare 39)

In this game,you play as a flawed robot - Robocre,who wants to become a

"Super fighting robot".

However,in order to do so,he has to get pass 8 different trials...

FEATURING:

*Bullet hell!

*Various weapons!

*Helpless little robot!

*EDM musics?

For further details,plz read the...readme file.

RNGSilvercraft,2017.7.31
